name: Junk Dealerz
description:
Hey, we made a "trashy" game!

Well we dont think its bad but theres definitely a lot of trash in it. Its a topdown fighting game with roguelite elements, lots of items and a bartering mechanic, set in a post apocalyptic wasteland. Try it out if you want!

This is our Ludum Dare 42 Entry!

Lodugh: Game Design/Programming
Konsumopfer77: Art

Sounds: freesound.org
Music: incompetech.com

Made with the Godot Engine

WEB VERSION does NOT INCLUDE the INTRO! However I linked it as a YouTube video.
Furthermore the sound is a little delayed and it might not run that fluid. I recommend you to play the downloadable version if you can.

WEB VERSION: Junk Dealerz HTML5
